title: Hybrid Learning Curriculum for Thoracic Tube Insertion Surgery Training

context.prior_knowledge: Basic anatomy and surgical procedure comprehension
context.additional_context: A long-term blended learning program for current practitioners, combining online e-learning with offline practical sessions.

learning_goals: Learners will be able to accurately describe the theoretical stages and anatomical structures of chest tube insertion surgery.
Learners will be able to perform the chest tube insertion procedure with over 80% accuracy through VR simulation.
Learners will be able to master surgical skills by achieving 90+ points (out of 100) on formative assessments.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
